title: Tarea principal: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
description: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
intro: I divided the task of planning a trip to Bogotá, Colombia into four functional areas: activities, tourist attractions, gastronomy, and local culture. Each area represents a distinct aspect of the travel plan, covering essential elements that contribute to a comprehensive and enjoyable trip to Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Activities
subtasks.description: Planning and organizing engaging activities for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A diverse list of activities suitable for different preferences and interests.
responsibilities: Research and recommend outdoor activities such as hiking in Monserrate or exploring La Candelaria.
Suggest cultural experiences like visiting museums or attending local events.

subtasks.title: Research Outdoor Activities
subtasks.description: Identify and gather information on outdoor activities such as hiking, biking, or nature walks available in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of outdoor activities with descriptions and locations.

subtasks.title: Explore Cultural Experiences
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of cultural experiences, including museums, art galleries, and local events in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural experiences with details and schedules.

subtasks.title: Plan Gastronomic Tours
subtasks.description: Research popular local restaurants, street food markets, and traditional dishes to create a gastronomic tour itinerary.
subtasks.expected_output: Itinerary with recommended food spots and dishes to try.

subtasks.title: Identify Adventure Activities
subtasks.description: Search for adventurous activities like zip-lining, paragliding, or rock climbing in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: List of adventure activities with providers and contact information.

subtasks.title: Tourist Attractions
subtasks.description: Identifying and including must-visit tourist spots in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: A curated list of popular attractions that showcase the city's highlights.
responsibilities: Research and list iconic landmarks like Plaza de Bolívar and Gold Museum.
Include off-the-beaten-path attractions to provide a well-rounded experience.

subtasks.title: Research Iconic Landmarks
subtasks.description: Identify and list must-visit tourist spots in Bogotá such as Plaza de Bolívar and Gold Museum.
subtasks.expected_output: List of iconic landmarks in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Explore Off-the-Beaten-Path Attractions
subtasks.description: Research and include lesser-known attractions to provide a unique experience for travelers.
subtasks.expected_output: List of off-the-beaten-path attractions in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Curate Cultural Experiences
subtasks.description: Identify cultural activities and events like local markets or traditional performances to immerse in the local culture.
subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural experiences in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Gastronomy
subtasks.description: Planning dining experiences to explore the local cuisine.
subtasks.expected_output: A selection of restaurants and food markets offering authentic Colombian dishes.
responsibilities: Research and recommend traditional Colombian dishes to try, such as Ajiaco or Bandeja Paisa.
Provide information on popular dining spots known for their quality and authenticity.

subtasks.title: Research Traditional Colombian Dishes
subtasks.description: Identify and list traditional Colombian dishes to try, such as Ajiaco or Bandeja Paisa.

subtasks.title: Identify Authentic Colombian Restaurants
subtasks.description: Research and recommend restaurants known for serving authentic Colombian cuisine.

subtasks.title: Explore Local Food Markets
subtasks.description: Find and list local food markets in Bogotá offering fresh ingredients and traditional Colombian products.

subtasks.title: Local Culture
subtasks.description: Immersing in the local culture through various activities and experiences.
subtasks.expected_output: Insights into Bogotá's cultural heritage and opportunities to engage with local traditions.
responsibilities: Identify cultural events or festivals happening during the visit.
Recommend visits to art galleries, theaters, or street markets to experience the city's vibrant culture.

subtasks.title: Research Cultural Events and Festivals
subtasks.description: Identify and research cultural events and festivals happening in Bogotá during the visit.
subtasks.expected_output: List of upcoming cultural events and festivals in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Explore Art Galleries and Museums
subtasks.description: Identify popular art galleries and museums in Bogotá to explore the local art scene.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended art galleries and museums to visit.

subtasks.title: Attend a Local Theater Performance
subtasks.description: Find information on local theater performances in Bogotá and select one to attend.
subtasks.expected_output: Information on a selected local theater performance to attend.

subtasks.title: Visit a Traditional Street Market
subtasks.description: Research traditional street markets in Bogotá to experience local culture and cuisine.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended traditional street markets to visit.
